text: Yang Chih-yuan (Yáng Zhìyuǎn) is the name of: *Jerry Yang (entrepreneur) (born 1968), Chinese name Yang Chih-yuan, Taiwanese American entrepreneur and the co-founder of Yahoo! Inc *Yang Chih-yuan, a Taiwanese schoolchild involved in a controversy about stamps designed for the International Day of Peace in 2004
title: Yang Chih-yuan
